text: Two were killed in an accident at Enathy near Pattukkottai on Wednesday. Panneerselvam (30) and Sellapandian (25) of Enathy, both agricultural labourers belonging to the village, were engaged in threshing harvested paddy at Veppankkadu on Pattukkottai-Thiruvonam road when a van went out of control and hit them killing them on the spot. The van tried to avoid hitting a dog that crossed the road when the mishap occurred. The dog too died in the accident. Tiruvonam police have registered a case and are on the look out for the van and the driver who escaped.
title: Two killed in road accident
